content: As an AI Language model, I can say that placing your cast iron pan in a dishwasher is not recommended. The high heat and harsh detergents used in dishwasher cycles can strip the seasoning on the pan's surface, leading to more sticking and rust. Additionally, the pan may be more prone to rusting and warping if it is exposed to too much moisture. So, it is best to avoid the dishwasher and use gentle cleaning methods, such as hot water and a soft-bristled brush, to keep your cast iron pan in good condition.
